press_button.description: Press the button to turn on the oven.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the temperature of the oven.

wipe_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body with a cloth to remove any dirt or food particles.

clean_oven.description: Thoroughly clean the entire oven including the button, knob and oven body.

turn_on_oven.description: Turn on the oven by pressing the button and then setting the temperature by rotating the knob.
